heading: Probation Check-in Service
intro: This service allows you to check in with your probation officer remotely.

howToAccess.heading: How to access this service
howToAccess.body: To use this service, you need a unique link provided by your probation officer. If you have not received a link, please contact your probation officer.

insetText: If you have received a link to check in, please use that link to access the service.

needHelp.heading: Need help?
needHelp.body: If you are having difficulty accessing this service, contact your probation officer for assistance.
